ccm:application.name: ccm-cms-types-xmlfeed
ccm:application.ccm:description:
The XML feed content type allows external XML feeds to act as data sources in the CCM system.
It is a kind of a simplified ccm-cms-type-siteproxy content type.
CCM is a collaboration and content management system which is based upon the Red Hat Web Application Framework (WAF), which is a platform for writing database-backed web applications in Java.
